Don Bexley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Bexley 0 Donald Thomas "Don" Bexley (March 10, 1910 – April 15, 1997) was an American actor and comedian, best known for playing Fred Sanford (Redd Foxx)'s friend Bubba Bexley on the 1970s television sitcom Sanford and Son. Donald_Thomas_"_Don_"_Bexley ( March_10_,_1910 – April_15_,_1997 ) was an_American_actor_and_comedian , best_known for playing Fred_Sanford ( Redd_Foxx ) 's_friend_Bubba_Bexley on the_1970s_television_sitcom_Sanford_and_Son .
